languages.text: "Рад это слышать. Хотя я и надеялся, что господин ван Калокс представит нас лично".

traits.locale_text: "Рад это слышать. Хотя я и надеялся, что господин ван Калокс представит нас лично".

languages.text: "I'm glad to hear it. But still, I was hoping that Master van Calox would introduce us personally."
languages.original_text: "Рад это слышать. Хотя я и надеялся, что господин ван Калокс представит нас лично".

traits.locale_text: "I'm glad to hear it. But still, I was hoping that Master van Calox would introduce us personally."
"I'm glad to hear it. But still, I was hoping that Master van Calox would introduce us personally."
"I'm glad to hear it. But still, I was hoping that Master van Calox would introduce us personally."
"I'm glad to hear it. But still, I was hoping that Master van Calox would introduce us personally."
"I'm glad to hear it. But still, I was hoping that Master van Calox would introduce us personally."

languages.text: “我很高兴听到这个信息。不过，我本以为冯·卡洛克斯大师会亲自介绍我们见面呢。”
languages.original_text: "I'm glad to hear it. But still, I was hoping that Master van Calox would introduce us personally."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴听到这个信息。不过，我本以为冯·卡洛克斯大师会亲自介绍我们见面呢。”

languages.text: «Me alegra saberlo. Aun así, esperaba que el maestro van Calox nos presentara en persona».
languages.original_text: "I'm glad to hear it. But still, I was hoping that Master van Calox would introduce us personally."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegra saberlo. Aun así, esperaba que el maestro van Calox nos presentara en persona».

languages.text: 「そうでしたか。それにしても、ヴァン・カロックス様と直接お近づきになりたかったものです」
languages.original_text: "I'm glad to hear it. But still, I was hoping that Master van Calox would introduce us personally."

traits.locale_text: 「そうでしたか。それにしても、ヴァン・カロックス様と直接お近づきになりたかったものです」

languages.text: "Freut mich, das zu hören. Dennoch hatte ich gehofft, Meister van Calox würde uns einander persönlich vorstellen."
languages.original_text: "I'm glad to hear it. But still, I was hoping that Master van Calox would introduce us personally."

traits.locale_text: "Freut mich, das zu hören. Dennoch hatte ich gehofft, Meister van Calox würde uns einander persönlich vorstellen."

languages.text: « Je suis ravi de l'apprendre. Je comptais néanmoins sur la présence de maître van Calox pour nous présenter dans les règles. »
languages.original_text: "I'm glad to hear it. But still, I was hoping that Master van Calox would introduce us personally."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis ravi de l'apprendre. Je comptais néanmoins sur la présence de maître van Calox pour nous présenter dans les règles. »

languages.text: "Bunu duyduğuma sevinmekle birlikte Üstat van Calox'un bizi şahsen tanıştırmasını umuyordum."
languages.original_text: "I'm glad to hear it. But still, I was hoping that Master van Calox would introduce us personally."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu duyduğuma sevindim ama yine de Üstat van Calos'un bizi şahsen tanıştıracağını umuyordum."
